query.mssql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'{0}') BEGIN create table {0} ( [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Number] int NOT NULL, [CounterpartyName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ContractNumber] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Supervisor] nvarchar(max) NULL, [ManagementBoss] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DivisionBoss] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Executor] nvarchar(max) NULL, [CoExecutor] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Amount] float NULL, [Currency] nvarchar(max) NULL) END
query.postgres: create table if not exists {0} ( ReportSessionId citext NULL, Number int NOT NULL, CounterpartyName citext NULL, ContractNumber citext NULL, Supervisor citext NULL, ManagementBoss citext NULL, DivisionBoss citext NULL, Executor citext NULL, CoExecutor citext NULL, Amount numeric NULL, Currency citext NULL)

query.default: select Number, CounterpartyName, ContractNumber, Supervisor, ManagementBoss, DivisionBoss, Executor, CoExecutor, Amount, Currency from DirRX_Reports_ContractReport where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by Number
